name: simorgh-german-learning
description: Complete German Learning App with Backend and Mobile App

scripts.start:full: pkill -f 'expo start' && pkill -f 'nodemon' && lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null && lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null && echo 'Starting backend...' && npm run backend > backend.log 2>&1 & echo 'Backend started, waiting...' && sleep 5 && echo 'Starting Expo...' && cd app && npx expo start --clear --port 8081
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../app && npm install && cd ../backend/admin && npm install

author: Simorgh Team
